name: EnvironmentTest
description: Tests the behavior of the Environment class, particularly the binding and optimization of sub-environments.

test_cases.name: testOptimizeSubEnvironment
test_cases.description: Tests the optimization of sub-environments by binding values and checking the environment's depth and value map.

name: LintTest
description: Tests that source code has no flaws and checks for various linting rules.

nested_classes.name: Message
nested_classes.description: Warning that code is not as it should be.

nested_classes.name: GlobalState
nested_classes.description: Internal state of the lint rules.

nested_classes.name: FileState
nested_classes.description: Internal state of the lint rules, per file.

test_cases.name: testLint
test_cases.description: Tests that source code has no flaws by executing a linting program on a list of Java files and asserting that no linting messages are produced.

name: CalciteTest
description: Tests the functionality of CalciteForeignValue with nested schemas.

nested_classes.name: UserSchema
nested_classes.description: Java object that will, via reflection, become the 'user' schema.

nested_classes.name: TaskSchema
nested_classes.description: Java object that will, via reflection, become the 'task' schema.

test_cases.name: testNestedSchema
test_cases.description: Tests that if you create a CalciteForeignValue whose schema has nested schemas, those schemas appear as fields.

name: ScriptTest
description: Test suite for running scripts and checking their outputs.

methods.name: checkRun
methods.signature: protected void checkRun(String path) throws Exception

test_cases.name: test
test_cases.description: Tests the execution of a script by invoking the corresponding method or running the script directly.

test_cases.name: testScript
test_cases.description: Tests the execution of the 'script.sml' script.

name: SatTest
description: Unit tests for the Sat class, focusing on building and solving SAT formulas.

test_cases.name: testBuild
test_cases.description: Tests building a SAT formula with three clauses, each containing three terms, and verifies its satisfiability.

test_cases.name: testTrue
test_cases.description: Tests the 'true' condition by creating an 'and' term with zero arguments and verifies its satisfiability.

test_cases.name: testFalse
test_cases.description: Tests the 'false' condition by creating an 'or' term with zero arguments and verifies its unsatisfiability.

name: PairListTest
description: Unit tests for the PairList class, which is a list of pairs.

methods.name: left
methods.signature: <T, U> List<T> left(List<? extends Map.Entry<? extends T, ? extends U>> pairs)

methods.name: right
methods.signature: <T, U> List<U> right(List<? extends Map.Entry<? extends T, ? extends U>> pairs)

methods.name: validate
methods.signature: <T, U> void validate(PairList<T, U> pairList, List<? extends Map.Entry<T, U>> list)

test_cases.name: testPairList
test_cases.description: Tests various methods of the PairList class, including adding, removing, clearing, and converting to immutable.

test_cases.name: testAddAll
test_cases.description: Tests the addAll method of the PairList class, including adding from different types of PairLists and ImmutableLists.

test_cases.name: testPairListOfMap
test_cases.description: Tests the creation of a PairList from a Map and converting it back to an ImmutableMap.

test_cases.name: testPairListWithCapacity
test_cases.description: Tests the creation of a PairList with a specified capacity and its basic operations.

test_cases.name: testPairListOf
test_cases.description: Tests the creation of a PairList with different numbers of arguments and checks for exceptions.

test_cases.name: testTransform
test_cases.description: Tests the transformation and matching methods of the PairList class.

test_cases.name: testBuilder
test_cases.description: Tests the builder pattern for creating PairLists.

name: UtilTest
description: Unit tests for various utility classes and methods in the Morel project.

test_cases.name: testTailList
test_cases.description: Tests the functionality of the TailList class, including size, get, set, add, addAll, clear, and isEmpty methods.

test_cases.name: testOrd
test_cases.description: Tests the forEachIndexed method from the Ord class, which iterates over a list with indices.

test_cases.name: testMapList
test_cases.description: Tests the creation and usage of a MapList, which maps integers to elements using a function.

test_cases.name: testFolder
test_cases.description: Tests the Folder class methods for managing and combining AST expressions.

test_cases.name: testShorterThan
test_cases.description: Tests the shorterThan method from the Static class, which checks if an iterable is shorter than a given size.

test_cases.name: testFind
test_cases.description: Tests the find method from the Static class, which finds the index of an element in a list that matches a predicate.

test_cases.name: testPos
test_cases.description: Tests the Pos class methods for splitting strings and generating position strings.

test_cases.name: testPower
test_cases.description: Tests the nextPowerOfTwo method from the Static class, which calculates the next power of two for a given integer.

test_cases.name: testTransform
test_cases.description: Tests the transform method from the Static class, which applies a function to each element of a list.

test_cases.name: testToString
test_cases.description: Tests the floatToString method from the Codes class, which converts a float to a string.

test_cases.name: testFloatBit
test_cases.description: Tests the isNegative method from the Codes class, which checks if a float is negative.

test_cases.name: testPairAllMatch
test_cases.description: Tests the anyMatch, allMatch, and noneMatch methods from the Pair class, which check conditions on pairs of elements from two iterables.

test_cases.name: testRangeExtent
test_cases.description: Tests the RangeExtent class, which handles ranges and their extents, including iterables over those ranges.

name: ExtentTest
description: Tests for the Extent functionality in the Morel language compiler.

nested_classes.name: Fixture
nested_classes.description: Internal helper class for setting up test fixtures.

test_cases.name: testConstant
test_cases.description: Tests whether an expression is constant.

test_cases.name: testEq
test_cases.description: Tests a variable assigned a single value.

test_cases.name: testBetween
test_cases.description: Tests the extent of a variable within a range and other conditions.

test_cases.name: testSubTrue
test_cases.description: Tests the subTrue method which substitutes true in an expression.

test_cases.name: testFlatten
test_cases.description: Tests the flattening of AND and OR expressions.

test_cases.name: testAnalysis2c
test_cases.description: Tests the analysis of extents with various conditions.

test_cases.name: testAnalysis2d
test_cases.description: Tests the analysis of extents with specific conditions.

name: InlineTest
description: Tests for inlining and analyzing expressions in the Morel language.

methods.name: gen
methods.signature: private String gen(int i, int n)

test_cases.name: testAnalyze
test_cases.description: Tests the analysis of a Morel expression and checks the result against an expected string.

test_cases.name: testInline
test_cases.description: Tests the inlining of a simple function and checks the generated plan against an expected string.

test_cases.name: testInlineFn
test_cases.description: Tests the inlining of a function with a nested function and checks the generated plan and evaluation result.

test_cases.name: testInlineFnUnit
test_cases.description: Tests the inlining of a function with a unit parameter and checks the evaluation result and core representation.

test_cases.name: testLetAtomic
test_cases.description: Tests the inlining of a variable with an atomic value and checks the evaluation result and core representation.

test_cases.name: testInlineChained
test_cases.description: Tests the inlining of chained expressions and checks the evaluation result for various depths.

test_cases.name: testFromPredicate
test_cases.description: Tests the inlining of a predicate within a 'from' expression and checks the core representation and evaluation result.

test_cases.name: testFromView
test_cases.description: Tests the inlining of a view function within a 'from' expression and checks the core representation and evaluation result.

test_cases.name: testMapFilterToFrom
test_cases.description: Tests the conversion of 'map' and 'filter' expressions to a 'from' expression and checks the core representation and evaluation result.

test_cases.name: testFilterMapFilterMapToFrom
test_cases.description: Tests the conversion of nested 'filter' and 'map' expressions to a 'from' expression and checks the core representation and evaluation result.

test_cases.name: testFromFrom
test_cases.description: Tests the inlining of nested 'from' expressions and checks the core representation and evaluation result.

test_cases.name: testFromEmptyFrom
test_cases.description: Tests the inlining of an empty 'from' expression and checks the core representation and evaluation result.

test_cases.name: testInlineCase
test_cases.description: Tests the inlining of a singleton 'case' expression and checks the core representation and evaluation result.

test_cases.name: testInlineCase2
test_cases.description: Tests the inlining of a singleton 'case' expression with a tuple and checks the core representation and evaluation result.

name: FromBuilderTest
description: Unit tests for the FromBuilder class, which constructs and simplifies Core.From expressions.

nested_classes.name: Fixture
nested_classes.description: Internal helper class providing setup for test cases.

test_cases.name: testBasic
test_cases.description: Tests the basic functionality of scanning and building a FromBuilder expression.

test_cases.name: testWhereOrder
test_cases.description: Tests the functionality of adding where and order clauses to a FromBuilder expression.

test_cases.name: testTrivialYield
test_cases.description: Tests the functionality of adding a yield clause to a FromBuilder expression.

test_cases.name: testTrivialYield2
test_cases.description: Tests the functionality of adding multiple scans and a yield clause to a FromBuilder expression.

test_cases.name: testTrivialYield3
test_cases.description: Tests the functionality of adding a yield clause before a scan in a FromBuilder expression.

test_cases.name: testNested
test_cases.description: Tests the functionality of nesting FromBuilder expressions and adding a where clause.

test_cases.name: testNested3
test_cases.description: Tests the functionality of nesting FromBuilder expressions and adding a where clause, including simplification.

test_cases.name: testNested4
test_cases.description: Tests the functionality of nesting FromBuilder expressions and adding a where clause, including simplification with tuple types.

test_cases.name: testNestedSameName
test_cases.description: Tests the functionality of nesting FromBuilder expressions with the same variable name and adding a where clause.

test_cases.name: testNested0
test_cases.description: Tests the functionality of nesting an empty FromBuilder expression.

test_cases.name: testNested2
test_cases.description: Tests the functionality of nesting FromBuilder expressions with record patterns and adding a where clause.

test_cases.name: testNestedFromTuple
test_cases.description: Tests the functionality of nesting FromBuilder expressions with tuple patterns and adding a where clause.

name: ShellTest
description: Unit tests for the Shell class, focusing on various input scenarios and configurations.

test_cases.name: testShell
test_cases.description: Tests the Shell with empty input.

test_cases.name: testShellNoBanner
test_cases.description: Tests the Shell with empty input and banner disabled.

test_cases.name: testOneLine
test_cases.description: Tests the Shell with one line of input.

test_cases.name: testTwoLines
test_cases.description: Tests the Shell with a continued line of input.

test_cases.name: testReal
test_cases.description: Tests the Shell printing some tricky real values.

test_cases.name: testEmptyLines
test_cases.description: Tests the Shell with lines that are comments, empty, or have only a semicolon.

test_cases.name: testSingleLineComment
test_cases.description: Tests the Shell with a single-line comment.

test_cases.name: testSingleLineCommentWithQuote
test_cases.description: Tests the Shell with a single-line comment that contains a quote.

test_cases.name: testMultiLineLet
test_cases.description: Tests the Shell with a let statement spread over multiple lines.

test_cases.name: testUse
test_cases.description: Tests the use function.

test_cases.name: testMatchWarning
test_cases.description: Tests a warning.

test_cases.name: testUseEmpty
test_cases.description: Tests the use function on an empty file.

test_cases.name: testUseMissing
test_cases.description: Tests the use function on a missing file.

test_cases.name: testUseSelfReferential
test_cases.description: Tests the use function on a file that uses itself.

test_cases.name: testRaw
test_cases.description: Tests a script running in raw mode using Main rather than Shell.

test_cases.name: testStringDepth
test_cases.description: Tests the string depth functionality.

test_cases.name: testPrintDepth
test_cases.description: Tests the print depth functionality.

test_cases.name: testPrintLength
test_cases.description: Tests the print length functionality.

test_cases.name: testLineWidth
test_cases.description: Tests the line width functionality.

name: AlgebraTest
description: Tests various algebraic operations and queries using the 'scott' JDBC database.

test_cases.name: testScott
test_cases.description: Tests a program that uses an external collection from the 'scott' JDBC database.

test_cases.name: testScott2
test_cases.description: As previous, but with more concise syntax.

test_cases.name: testScottOrder
test_cases.description: Tests ordering and limiting operations on the 'scott' JDBC database.

test_cases.name: testScottJoin
test_cases.description: Tests join operations between 'emp' and 'dept' tables in the 'scott' JDBC database.

test_cases.name: testScottJoin2
test_cases.description: As testScottJoin() but without intermediate variables.

test_cases.name: testScottJoin2Dot
test_cases.description: As testScottJoin2() but using dot notation ('e.field' rather than '#field e').

test_cases.name: testQueryList
test_cases.description: Tests that Morel gives the same answer with and without Calcite.

test_cases.name: testNative
test_cases.description: Translates a hybrid expression. The leaf cannot be translated to Calcite and therefore becomes a Morel table function; the root can.

test_cases.name: testHybridCalciteToMorel
test_cases.description: Tests a query that can mostly be executed in Calcite, but is followed by List.filter, which must be implemented in Morel.

test_cases.name: testFullCalcite
test_cases.description: Tests a query that can be fully executed in Calcite.

test_cases.name: testFullCalcite2
test_cases.description: As testFullCalcite() but table is via a 'let'.

test_cases.name: testFullCalcite3
test_cases.description: As testFullCalcite() but query is a function, and table is passed via an argument.

test_cases.name: testCalciteFrom
test_cases.description: Tests a query that is 'from' over no variables. The result has one row and zero columns.

test_cases.name: testCalciteWithVariable
test_cases.description: Tests a query that is executed in Calcite except for a variable, 'five', whose value happens to always be '2 + 3'.

test_cases.name: testCalciteWithVariableNoInlining
test_cases.description: Tests a query that is executed in Calcite except for a variable, 'five', whose value happens to always be '2 + 3'. No inlining is performed.

test_cases.name: testCalciteWithFunction
test_cases.description: Tests a query that is executed in Calcite except for a function, 'twice'.

test_cases.name: testCalciteWithHybridFunction
test_cases.description: Tests a query that is executed in Calcite except for a function, 'plus'; one of its arguments comes from a relational record, and another from the Morel environment.

test_cases.name: testUnion
test_cases.description: Tests that we can send 'union' to Calcite.

test_cases.name: testExcept
test_cases.description: Tests that we can send 'except' to Calcite.

test_cases.name: testIntersect
test_cases.description: Tests that we can send 'intersect' to Calcite.

test_cases.name: testElem
test_cases.description: Tests that we can send (what in SQL would be) an uncorrelated 'IN' sub-query to Calcite.

test_cases.name: testNotElem
test_cases.description: Tests that we can send (what in SQL would be) an uncorrelated 'IN' sub-query to Calcite.

test_cases.name: testExists
test_cases.description: Tests that 'exists' is pushed down to Calcite. (There are no correlating variables.)

test_cases.name: testNotExists
test_cases.description: Tests that 'not exists' (uncorrelated), also 'notExists' and 'List.null', is pushed down to Calcite.

test_cases.name: testExistsCorrelated
test_cases.description: Tests that correlated 'exists' is pushed down to Calcite.

test_cases.name: testCorrelatedListSubQuery
test_cases.description: Tests a query that is executed in Calcite except for a list sub-query.

test_cases.name: testCorrelatedScalar
test_cases.description: Tests a query that is executed in Calcite except for a scalar sub-query.

test_cases.name: testRecursive
test_cases.description: Tests a recursive query that computes a transitive closure by successive union operations.

test_cases.name: testRecursive2
test_cases.description: Similar to testRecursive() but uses the Relatonal.iterate function.
